day (e.g. Wednesday) or the entire sequence.
We will split the data into standard weeks, working backwards from the test dataset. The
ﬁnal year of the data is in 2010 and the ﬁrst Sunday for 2010 was January 3rd. The data ends
in mid November 2010 and the closest ﬁnal Saturday in the data is November 20th. This gives
46 weeks of test data. The ﬁrst and last rows of daily data for the test dataset are provided
below for conﬁrmation.
